entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 05:38 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of hail this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of hail early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
